name: School Bus Jet 2016 – Flying Public Transport Flight with Extreme Skydiving Air Stunts
name_original: School Bus Jet 2016 – Flying Public Transport Flight with Extreme Skydiving Air Stunts
description:
All the kids are straight outta school ready for awesome tourist trips on the extreme hill bus and wacky campout. Let the kids enjoy this awesome flying bus game with limitless fun. wacky stunts and drifts.

Aye Caramba, wacky stunts and drifts await your kids. Get your kids to enjoy their summer vacations with the latest flying school bus game. Forget the old schoolbus driver and school parking games. Welcome to the new millennium of flying simulators

Get the perfect feel of driving a school bus jet in the futuristic flying Simulator
